snippet.title: Fallout 2 (HD) Intro
snippet.description:
Flashing Seizure Warning at 2:55 to 3:01! 

Fallout 1, 2, New Vegas and 3 are available to purchase at 
Fallout 
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/agecheck/app/38400/
GOG -  https://www.gog.com/game/fallout?pp=12f0de3dc76e067d21ed85125716e02e9f1e69f0
Fallout 2
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/agecheck/app/38410/
GOG - https://www.gog.com/game/fallout_2
Fallout New Vegas 
GOG - https://www.gog.com/game/fallout_new_vegas_ultimate_edition
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/agecheck/app/22380/
Fallout 3
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/22370/Fallout_3_Game_of_the_Year_Edition/
GOG - https://www.gog.com/game/fallout_3_game_of_the_year_edition


Fallout 2 mods

http://www.nma-fallout.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=51475
